title: Magic is Better than Tech
content: Hogwarts is a superior school for learning how to manipulatle the world, tech is simply 5 steps behind where magic is.

title: Monster.com
content: I'm a little confused why Monster.com doesn't actually feature any monsters? Coming from Monster University, this was very dissapoiting.

title: Chasing my Tail
content: I constantly feel like tech is updating so fast that I can't keep up and that I'm perpetually chasing my tail tring to catch up while also trying to learn the most recent tech that came out before the newest!

title: I miss CSS
content: I am feeling the pressure to be less creative and more productive, I miss the days of CSS!

title: My new IMAC isn't working as expected.
content: I recently purchased a new IMAC, because my friend Jim kept raving about Big Macs...frankly I don't think it tastes very good at all, what am I doing wrong?
